Module com.benedict.minibank
Package com.benedict.library.Models

Class Model

java.lang.Object
com.benedict.library.Models.Model
public class Model extends Object
The central model class for the Library application. This class is a singleton that serves as a bridge between the application's business logic, data access objects (DAOs), and views. It manages the application's state and user data.

      Returns:
